articles.author: Rebecca Bellan
articles.title: Startups and investors are turning to micromobility subscriptions
articles.description: Micromobility vendors are keen to follow other industries into the subscription model for a few reasons: ease of scaling, return on investment and cost-per-mile to operate.
articles.content: Amid the chaos of the COVID-19 pandemic and the murky path to profitability for shared electric micromobility, an increasing number of companies have turned to subscriptions. It’s a business model th… [+3583 chars]
